com.cloudera.labs.envelope.spark

Enum Contexts

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Contexts>
      • com.cloudera.labs.envelope.spark.Contexts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Contexts>

    public enum Contexts
extends Enum<Contexts>
    Used as a singleton for any driver code in Envelope to retrieve the various Spark contexts, and have them instantiated automatically if they have not already been created.

        public static Contexts[] values()
